nodes.text: Klak was a type of food considered a delicacy by Wookiees, a species native to the planet of Kashyyyk. Servings of fried Klak were among a buffet served at the wedding of Wookiees Chewbacca and Mallatobuck in 2 BBY. A Human named Han Solo deemed the dish one of several there that were suitable for consumption by his species even though most Wookiee dishes were spicy enough to damage his stomach.
Klak appeared briefly in Rebel Dawn, a 1998 novel that was the third volume of The Han Solo Trilogy by A. C. Crispin.
